name: Dice Drop Dash (Horizon Skew)
description:
You Are A D20.

The human that rolled you has just accidentally chucked you off the table...right in the middle of a climactic fight with an orc.

Your human's survival now depends on you. Roll yourself to the highest number possible before you are found!

The fate of the game session relies on you...good luck!

CONTROLS:

Use Space to roll the dice/skip intro.

Press Escape to stop game instance.

Thank you to anyone who takes the time to play this little game! This is my first jam game and my first official "published" game...ever! It's both exciting and scary to release something to the public.  I've always had a nasty habit of never releasing what I work on so here's hoping this breaks that cycle. Anywho, thanks again for playing my little silly dice game :)

If anyone is interested in updates on future projects I work on you can follow me on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/horizonskew (chances are I won't post much but big project updates I certainly will!)
